### Example 1: Create a gallery image definition. (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> New-AzGalleryImageDefinition -EndOfLifeDate $endOfLifeDate -GalleryName $galleryName -Location $location -Name $galleryImageDefinitionName -Offer $offerName -OsState Generalized -OsType Windows -Publisher $publisherName -ResourceGroupName $resourceGroupName -Sku $skuName -Tag Sql
```
